shared

Class FileOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.FileOperations

  • public class FileOperations
extends java.lang.Object
    File Operations class. Common file operations that are shared by all modules Created by OmniBox on 09-11-2014.

    • Constructor Summary

      FileOperations()

      static void readFileToSocket(java.net.Socket socket, OmniFile file)
      This method reads file from disk and write it on the socket.

    • Method Detail

      • saveFileFromSocket

        public static OmniFile saveFileFromSocket(java.net.Socket socket,
                          java.lang.String destinyDirectoryPath)
                                   throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                          java.io.IOException
        This method savesOmniFile to disk, and returns that OmniFile. File is retrieved through a TCP socket.
        Parameters:
        socket -
        destinyDirectoryPath - this param is the destiny folder to save file. Must end in / so the file may be named "temp"
        Returns:
        OmniFile created after transfer is finished
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there's an error with file/socket operations
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If file already exists

      • readFileToSocket

        public static void readFileToSocket(java.net.Socket socket,
                    OmniFile file)
                             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                    java.io.IOException
        This method reads file from disk and write it on the socket. Is expected for someone to be reading it from the other side of the TCP socket.
        Parameters:
        socket -
        file -
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException - If there's an error with file/socket operations
